sentences.en: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.cn: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.en: go easy on fatty foods.
sentences.cn: 少吃高脂肪食品。

sentences.en: going on an economy drive is easier said than done.
sentences.cn: 开展节约运动说起来容易做起来难。

sentences.en: going on an economy drive is easier said than done.
sentences.cn: 开展节约运动说起来容易做起来难。

sentences.en: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.en: I found it very easy to forget about Sumner.
sentences.cn: 我发现忘掉萨姆纳很容易。

sentences.en: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.cn: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
sentences.cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

sentences.en: It is easy to find excuses for his indecisiveness.
sentences.cn: 为他的犹豫不决寻找借口是很容易的。

sentences.en: It is the easy way out to blame others for our failure.
sentences.cn: 把我们的失败归罪到别人头上倒是省事。

sentences.en: It was within easy walking distance of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 它离旅馆仅几步之遥。

sentences.en: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.cn: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.en: It's easy to get a tummy upset from river water.
sentences.cn: 喝河水很容易闹肚子。

sentences.en: It's fashionable but wearable, and it's easy to look after.
sentences.cn: 它既时尚又耐穿，而且容易打理。

sentences.en: Making easy money has always been an attractive proposition.
sentences.cn: 轻松赚钱总是件诱人的事。

sentences.en: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.cn: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.en: The home is situated within easy access of shops and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 房子位置便利，距离商店及其他设施都不远。

sentences.en: The park is within easy walking distance (= close enough to walk to ).
sentences.cn: 公园很近，步行便可到达。

sentences.en: The prospect of easy profits has attracted the wrong kind of businessman.
sentences.cn: 轻松捞取利润的可能性吸引了一拨不良商人。

sentences.en: The station is within easy reach of (= close to ) the town centre.
sentences.cn: 车站离市中心不远。

sentences.en: The test was easy.
sentences.cn: 考试很容易。

sentences.en: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.cn: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.en: This boat has a good deck layout making everything easy to operate.
sentences.cn: 这艘船的甲板布局合理，使得所有操控都很方便。

sentences.en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

sentences.en: this insurance policy will let you rest easy.
sentences.cn: 这份保险单会让你高枕无忧。

sentences.en: Victory was not as easy as the scoreline suggests.
sentences.cn: 胜利并不像最终比分显示的那么轻而易举。

sentences.en: We found him very approachable and easy to talk with.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他非常和蔼可亲，容易交谈。

sentences.en: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

sentences.en: You had an easy time of it at home.
sentences.cn: 你在家度过了一段轻松时光。

words.tran_cn: 减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动

phrases.tran_cn: 说时容易做时难
便于检修；容易接近
悖入悖出；来得容易去得也快
［尤在口语中］来得容易去得快
［尤在口语中］小心行事；从容图之；不着急，不着忙
随和；好相处的；从容不迫的
安装方便
简单生活；松逸生活；原味生活
容易接近；容易到达；容易得到的
节制点；不要太多；对…宽容
(非正式)好看（或听）的，悦目（或耳）的
易操作的
使用方便；易用性
休闲小站（餐饮）
adj. 无拘无束的；过分随便的；马虎的
(非正式)温和地对待某人，宽容地对待某人
安闲；从容不迫
(非正式)有节制地使用（或消耗）
(非正式)容易，轻易；幸运
(非正式)我随便（表示没有特别喜好或要求）
(旧或幽默)（女人）放荡的，水性杨花的，滥交的
生活富裕
adv. 以分期付款方式；以宽厚的条件
煎半熟蛋；煎两面；结束容易
高枕无忧；大放宽心
简易明了
安然入睡；放心，高枕无忧
如此轻而易举；就这么简单
(军)休息！（命令稍息状态的士兵进一步放松姿态的口令）
从容不迫，不慌不忙
（选择最简单而非最体面的方式）使自己摆脱困境

trans.tran_cn: 容易的，不拘束的，舒适的，悦耳的，好看的，易受攻击的
trans.tran_en: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort
not difficult to do, and not needing much effort
